metadata.title: USN-3729-1 -- libxcursor vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libxcursor incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3729-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxcursor-dev - 1:1.1.14-1ubuntu0.16.04.2 libxcursor1 - 1:1.1.14-1ubuntu0.16.04.2 libxcursor1-udeb - 1:1.1.14-1ubuntu0.16.04.2 No subscription required
